new.name: hdrcde
new.title: Highest Density Regions and Conditional Density Estimation
new.description:
Computation of highest density regions in one and two
dimensions, kernel estimation of univariate density functions
conditional on one covariate,and multimodal regression.

new.name: rtpcr
new.title: qPCR Data Analysis
new.description:
Tools for qPCR data analysis using ΔCt and ΔΔCt methods,
including t-tests, ANOVA, ANCOVA, repeated-measures models, and
publication-ready visualizations. The package supports multiple
target, and mul

new.name: pkgmeta
new.title: Find details about R packages on CRAN or github
new.description:
Finds meta data for all packages on CRAN that match a
given author and packages contained in specified github
repositories.

new.name: fpp2

This repository holds automated data releases for nflverse

new.name: ozbabynames
new.title: Australian Popular Baby Names
new.description:
Data on the most popular baby names by sex and year, and
for each state in Australia, as provided by the state and
territory governments. The quality and quantity of the data
varies with the state.

new.name: vital
new.title:
Tidy Analysis Tools for Mortality, Fertility, Migration and
Population Data
new.description:
Analysing vital statistics based on tools consistent with
the tidyverse. Tools are provided for data visualization, life
table calculations, computing net migration numbers, Lee-Carter
modelling; func

new.title:

new.description:
All data sets from "Forecasting: methods and applications"
by Makridakis, Wheelwright & Hyndman (Wiley, 3rd ed., 1998)
<https://robjhyndman.com/forecasting/>.
